text: aur hamane moosa kee maan ke paas ye vahee bhejee ki tum usako doodh pila lo phir jab usakee nisbat tumako koee khauph ho to isako (ek sandooq mein rakhakar) dariya mein daal do aur (us par) tum kuchh na darana aur na kudhana (tum itamenaan rakho) ham usako phir tumhaare paas pahuncha degen aur usako (apana) rasool banaengen
